row.name: UC4RB_AWS_ALLOW_REASSOC#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_AWS_ALLOW_REASSOCs.00" nl="1" text="Allow reassociation" tooltip="[VPC] Allows an Elastic IP address that is already associated with an instance or a network interface to be re-associated with the specified instance or interface. Otherwise, the operation fails." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Allow reassociation</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_AWS_ALLOW_REASSOCs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">[VPC] Allows an Elastic IP address that is already associated with an instance or a network interface to be re-associated with the specified instance or interface. Otherwise, the operation fails.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="customfield"/></properties> </dynradiogroup>
